tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE query_anomalies (
  query_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  query_text TEXT,
  anomaly_detected BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE anomalies_table (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                          description STRING,
                          timestamp TIMESTAMP,
                          severity INT);

CREATE TABLE investigation_table (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                             anomaly_id INT,
                             query STRING,
                             result STRING,
                             FOREIGN KEY (anomaly_id) REFERENCES anomalies_table(id));

CREATE TABLE anomalies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    anomaly_description TEXT,
    data_source VARCHAR(50),
    anomaly_type VARCHAR(50)
)
